reapack.name: Reaper Setlist Custom
reapack.desc: Reaper Setlist with Export Recordings Feature

version.name: 2.1.0-custom
version.author: stefan-tradingbot
version.changelog:
## [2.1.0-custom] (2025-11-06)
### Features * Add "Export Recordings" button on Setup page * Integrated stem export functionality from stem_export_chatgpt.lua
### Changes * Added new RPC operation: exportRecordings * Created export_recordings.lua operation * Modified setup page UI to include Export Recordings section
